message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. We can adjust later if you think it's not fair.
I'll take a bit more, but still willing to compromise. Your turn to adjust if needed.
I think it's time to meet halfway.  Let's both take a slight hit from our last offer and split it 40/60. If you reject, this game is likely to get very unfavorable for both of us.
